channel.title: Need 2 scripts please
channel.description: I need 2 easy to use scripts. One that will mine any ore and one that will smelt ore into bars and smith them into what I choose and then bank.please make them SIMPLE to use. thank you so much. :D[br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2007, 06:56:11 PM[/size][hr]Oh come on, 6 views and 0 posts? come on! post![br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2007, 07:09:35 PM[/size][hr]Oh, and anti-randoms except geni and set the skill to strength

item.title: Need 2 scripts please
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

existingqwer:

You’re asking for too much. There’s no script that can mine and bank and smith all together, and it probably wouldn’t be simple to use.

It’s very possible, it’s just it’s hard to do because srl randoms don’t work well so when it finds a random it can’t handle, it switches player so maybe on a run of 8 until they aren’t active(probs 25-30 hours) would get lost in different locations.

Read full topic
